headline: Blackbird.AI Named in the Gartner® AI Vendor Race report as 'The Company to Beat for Disinformation Narrative Intelligence'
summary: Blackbird.AI, the leader in protecting global companies, executives, and national security organizations from narrative attacks, today announced it has been named the Company To Beat in the December 8th, 2025, Gartner AI Vendor Race: Blackbird.AI Is the Company to Beat for Disinformation Narrative Intelligence. Gartner states that "Blackbird.AI's strong brand, defining thought leadership, industry-first feature expansion, and key partnerships make it the frontrunner in the disinformation narrati
